DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare acute effect 5g Cassia cinnamon , 50 minute endurance exercise perform 70 % heart rate reserve ( correlate VO2max ) , 5g cellulose placebo blood glucose , serum insulin insulin sensitivity follow oral glucose tolerance test 3 hour administration intervention .
